```{r}
#| messages = FALSE
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf) 
income_ma <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract",
  variables = "B19013_001",   # Median household income
  state = "MA",
  year = 2020,
  geometry = TRUE,            # get spatial data
  output = "wide"
)

# Clean column names
income_ma <- income_ma |>
  rename(median_income = B19013_001E) |>
  filter(!is.na(median_income))
```



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
library(sf)

ggplot(income_ma) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = median_income), color = NA) +
  scale_fill_viridis(
    option = "mako",
    direction = -1,
    name = "Median Income ($)",
    labels = scales::label_comma()
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Income Inequality Across Massachusetts",
    subtitle = "Median Household Income by Census Tract (2020 ACS)",
    caption = "Source: U.S. Census Bureau, 2020 5-Year American Community Survey"
  ) +
  theme_void(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "right",
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 18),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 14, margin = margin(b = 10)),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 10)
  )

```
